.. py:function:: cipher(text, shift, encrypt=True)

   Encrypts and decrypts the alphabet characters in a string, by replacing letters
   with the character found 'shift' value away from original character in alphabet
   included below.

   :param text:
   :type text: The text string to encrypt or decrypt.
   :param shift:
   :type shift: The numerical distance by which to shift the original character in the
   :param alphabet.:
   :param encrypt:
   :type encrypt: When set to True will do the encryption, and when set to False, will work
   :param backwards to undo encryption.:

   .. rubric:: Example

   >>> cipher('test', 1, encrypt = True)
   'uftu'
